Uses of Class
hlcd.operations.Matrix

Packages that use Matrix
Package
Description
hlcd.exporter
Takes care of exporting the code found to .bin, .tex and .m (Matlab) file.
hlcd.linearCode
Contains the mathematical definition of a "code" along with a validator to ensure the code obtained is valid.
hlcd.operations
The tools used when searching for a code are found here.
hlcd.testing.optimizationTester
A tester package checking the optimizations of the bit manipulation operations of constant time used in this program yield the same output as the slower operations that use loops.

    MatrixOperations.getGPrime()
    Returns the matrix \(G^{\prime}_{k \times k} = G^{\kern0pt}_{k \times n} \overline{G}^{T}_{n \times k}\) without altering the current matrix.
    Matrix
    MatrixOperations.getGPrime​(byte lastPopulatedRowIndex)
    Returns the submatrix of \(G^{\prime}_{sub} = G^{\kern0pt}_{x \times n} \overline{G}^{T}_{n \times x}\), where \(x\) is the largest row index in \(G\) that is nonzero.
